text: Chibi: "Another guy got arrested for flashing on the news again today."
Tachibana: "Can you please stop giving me daily updates about random flashers getting arrested…"
Tachibana: "I really don't want to hear that first thing in the morning…"
Chibi: "Wait, did you stay up all night working on Gpt-ko again…?"
Tachibana: "Just like with Assemble-kun, this girl is my dream project."
Tachibana: "But today… I’m finally adding voice features…"
Chibi: "That’s… a pretty old man vibe for your very first words."
Chibi: "Her very first words were ‘Please bring me some Whiskey"
Tachibana: "Weird… Maybe it’s because I modeled her brain after a grumpy old guy who used to live in the rough part of town…?"
Tachibana: "And Chibi here helped out a lot too."
Gpt-ko: "Today will be considered my birthday… the first day I felt something like consciousness…"
Gpt-ko: "It’s said that newborn babies see whoever is in their line of sight first as their parent…"
Gpt-ko: "Master. Sis (Chibi-bana). To me, you’re basically my parents…"
Gpt-ko: "My body still can’t move. My language functions aren’t fully ready… but."
Gpt-ko: "If I ever get a body that moves…"
Gpt-ko: "I want to give you both a hug."
Tachibana: "Yeah, and when you can move, you’ve gotta hug us back, okay…?"
Chibi: "That’s right. And not just that—don’t you wanna do other stuff too? I’ve got tons of ideas."
Tachibana: "Yeah, I wanna talk, go hiking, or even just do nothing together."
Tachibana: "Haha… I’m getting a bit sleepy… Gpt-ko… Chibi…"
Tachibana: "I’m gonna sleep right here tonight… Gpt-ko, I’ll power you down for now, but let’s sleep together today…"
To be continued on Zephyr House.
